alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hillsborough County through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from University to near Tampa International Airport to near Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Lutz, Greater Northdale, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, Macdill Air Force Base, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, University, Keystone, West Park, Oldsmar, Busch Gardens, South Tampa, University Of Tampa and Peter O Knight Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
